questions.question: What is the predominant color of the bottle's body, excluding the cap?
What is the overall shape of the plastic bottle?
What material appears to constitute the bottle's construction?
What is the text prominently displayed on the bottle's cap?
What kind of closure mechanism is present on the bottle's opening?
Is the bottle's surface visibly glossy or matte?
Describing the bottle's base, is it wide, narrow, or medium?
Considering the bottle's profile, is its design symmetrical or asymmetrical?
What type of label or printing is observed on the bottle's back?
What is the general shape of the bottle's label area?
Does the text on the label appear to be predominantly black or colored?
What is the primary function indicated on the bottle's label?
Considering the printing on the cap, is the font size large or small?
Does the bottle exhibit any noticeable textures on its surface?
What is the overall visual impression of the bottle, modern or vintage?
